name: Seventh Season of "Cheers" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 7 | 20 Questions

questions.text: In the season opener, who gets fired at "Cheers"?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	Stone felt that Rebecca wasn't doing a good job so he gave Sam her job.

questions.text: In "Swear to God" who does Woody come dressed as when he scares Sam?
questions.explanation:
Moses.

	Sam had promised to give up sex if he wasn't the father of the baby of a woman he slept with. After he finds out he's not the father he forgets about his promise to God, and when Woody comes in he thinks Woody is God and it scared him.

questions.text: In "Executive Sweet" who does Rebecca go out with to help her career?
questions.explanation:
Martin Teal.

	She does date Robin, but not in this episode. Martin Teal was played by Alex Nevil.

questions.text: What does Martin Teal say about Sam Malone in "One Happy Chappy in a Snappy Serape"?
questions.correct: The Indians in the mountains sing a folksong about him.
options: The girls are all ga ga about him.
He's been voted sexiest man of all time in Mexico
questions.explanation:
The Indians in the mountains sing a folksong about him.

	Rebecca says she's engaged to Sam, and Martin says that Sam's sex explotations are legendary.

questions.text: What is the name of the figure skate that Carla is jealous of?
questions.explanation:
Franzi.

	Franzi was played by Isa Andersen.

questions.text: When Al gets a hold of Cliff's shock therapy button what does he say as he presses the button?
questions.explanation:
Dance, Mailman, Dance.

	Al is played by Al Rosen.

questions.text: In "Jumping Jerks" Sam wants to use a state with a shorter name than Mississippi.  What state does he want to use?
questions.explanation:
Maine.

	Sam: You know: One Maine, Two Maine."

questions.text: In "Send in the Crane" what is Frasier dressed up as at a party?
questions.explanation:
clown.

	He isn't wearing anything under the pants and when he pulls the hankerchief out, his clown pants fall down causing the woman to scream.

questions.text: What is Woody allergic to?
questions.explanation:
black cardamon.

	Black cardamon is the secret ingredient in Gary's Bloody Mary mix.

questions.text: What is the name of Sheridan's dog that Rebecca watched?
questions.explanation:
Buster.

	Satan is the name of the dog they get to replace Buster when Buster runs away. Cochiese is the name of the word that Woody says will cause Satan to attack (it's the wrong word however). Pavlov is the name of Frasier's dog that he ended up giving to Sam, Sam renamed it Diane (this was a totally differnt episode from a few seasons back).

questions.text: Who plays Margaret O'Keefe?
questions.explanation:
Annie Golden.

	Maggie is the woman that Cliff ends up dating, and then gets fired from the Post Office when she takes the mail truck to a sleezy motel.

questions.text: We first see Kelly Gaines in the episode called "Golden Boyd". Who plays her?
questions.explanation:
Jackie Swanson.

	Lori Loughin played Rebecca on "Full House". Markie Post played Christine in "Night Court". Park Overall was the nurse, Laverne,  in "Empty Nest".

questions.text: In "I Kid You Not" Woody wants to borrow Sam's car. What kind of car does Sam own?
questions.explanation:
Red Corvette.

	This is also the episode in which Lilith tells Frasier she's pregnant.

questions.text: In "The Cranemakers" where does Woody go on vacation?
questions.explanation:
airport.

	He was supposed to go to Italy, but he missed his plane and hung out at the airport for his entire vaccation.

questions.text: In "Hot Rocks" what does Rebecca say when she kisses Sam?
questions.explanation:
definite maybe.

	Admiral Crowe played himself in this episode.

questions.text: In "What's Up, Doc?" what problem does Sam pretend to have because he's interested in Dr. Rydell?
questions.explanation:
impotence.

	Dr. Sheila Rydell was played by Madolyn Smith-Osborne. She played Pam in the movie "Urban Cowboy".

questions.text: In "The Gift of the Woody" Cliff creates a rutabaga with a beet. What does he call this hybrid creation?
questions.explanation:
beetabega.

	This is also the song that features the "Kelly Song".

questions.text: Eddie's real first name isn't Edward, what is it?
questions.explanation:
Guy.

	She knows that Eddie didn't really send the flowers because the card is signed Edward and his real name is Guy. She says people only call him Eddie because Guy sounds too dorky.

questions.text: What is the name of Rebecca's sister?
questions.explanation:
Susan.

	Susan was played by Marcia Cross. Marcia Cross played Kimberly on "Melrose Place".

questions.text: What is the name of Frasier's married friend who hits on Rebecca?
questions.explanation:
Dr. Lawrence Crandell

	Crandell was played by John McMartin.
